activities: Verisk Crime Analytics, Inc. (“VCA”), offers advanced data management, analytics, and training solutions to its corporate customers. In the course of providing the APIS and Learn it Solutions products and services, VCA may access or obtain personal data about a corporate customer’s consumers or employees located in the EEA or Switzerland. VCA accesses or obtains these data on behalf of its customers for the purposes of administering, maintaining and supporting APIS and Learn it Solutions products and services. In connection with these data management, analytics, and training solutions, VCA acts as a service provider to its customers and pursuant to their instructions. VCA may obtain personal data directly from consumers when, for example, they visit a VCA  website and provide personal data online. In addition, VCA obtains personal data, such as contact information, in connection with maintaining its customer relationships and providing the APIS and Learn it Solutions products and services to its customers.
corpofftitle1: Senior Vice President, Enterprise Risk & Compliance
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: Enabl-u will cooperate with JAMS in accordance with the JAMS International Mediation Rules.
